sentences.sContent: You're hacking these days, you should go to see a doctor.
sentences.sContent_eng: You're hacking these days, you should go to see a doctor.
sentences.sCn: 这几天你总是干咳，你得找医生看一看啦。

sentences.sContent: If you notice a bad smell or think you may have an infection, see a doctor or gynecologist right away.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you notice a bad smell or think you may have an infection, see a doctor or gynecologist right away.
sentences.sCn: 如果你发现了身上有难闻的气味，或者你认为自己得了传染病，马上去看医生、或者妇科医生。

sentences.sContent: But if your symptoms persist—or worsen dramatically—see a doctor!
sentences.sContent_eng: But if your symptoms persist—or worsen dramatically—see a doctor!
sentences.sCn: 但是如果你的症状一直持续——或急剧恶化——去看医生吧！
